Reference

Aggregate & expand

Main functions to aggregate landings and expand

get_sample_data()

Pull a sample data set

get_species_data()

Pull species data from cfdbs

get_species_object()

Get species object

aggregate_landings()

Landings data aggregated based on length sample availability

fit_length_weight()

Fit length weight relationship to species data from SVDBS

expand_landings_to_lengths()

Proportions commercial landings based on length sample distribution

get_multinomial_props()

Use multinomial function to automatically fill holes in age data

create_age_length_key()

Creates Age length key

calc_numbers_at_age()

Calculates the numbers of fish at age

create_yr_semester_age_length_key()

Creates Age length key

Lazy Data

Data loaded with the package

marketCodeLookupTable

A lookup table for species market codes

speciesLookupTable

A lookup table for species codes

Helper functions

Aid in manipulation of data

combine_age_data()

Combine age data from svdbs and cfdbs

speciesLookupTable

A lookup table for species codes

get_species_object_mskeyrun()

Get species object

Package info

mscatch

mscatch: Expanding total catch for species by length composition
